animal.question: I say “meow” and love to chase string. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I like to drink milk.
🧶 I love to play with yarn.
🐈‍⬛ Many people keep me as a pet.

animal.question: I quack and swim. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I eat plants and sometimes bread.
🦢 I might have white feathers.
💧 I like to swim in ponds and lakes.

animal.question: I am big and gray, and I never forget. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love to eat peanuts.
🐘 I have a long trunk.
🌍 I live in Africa and Asia.

animal.question: I give you milk and say “moo”. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I eat grass in a field.
⚫ I might have black and white spots.
🥛 Farmers keep me on their farms for milk.

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I am the tallest mammal on earth.
spots I have brown spots all over me.
🌿 I like to eat acacia leaves.

animal.question: I have a shell and move very slowly. What am I?

hints.text: 🥬 I like to eat lettuce.
🏡 My shell is my home.
🐢 I can live for a very long time.

animal.question: I roar and I am the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 🦁 I have a mane around my neck.
🍖 I like to eat meat.
👑 I live in Africa.

animal.question: I hop around and have long ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I love to eat carrots.
🐇 I am very fast.
🌱 I live in burrows in the ground.

animal.question: I am a black and white striped animal. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 I live in Africa.
🐎 I look a bit like a horse.
🖤 My stripes help me camouflage.

animal.question: I swing from trees and love to eat bananas. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I live in the rainforest.
🌳 I use my tail to help me swing.
🍌 I am related to apes.

ocean.question: I have a shell and move very slowly on the sand. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I'm not very fast.
🏠 I carry my home on my back.
🏖️ You might see me on the beach.

ocean.question: I am a large body of saltwater, smaller than an ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🗺️ I'm often found next to land.
🚢 Ships travel on me.
💧 I am made of water, like an ocean.

ocean.question: I am a colorful fish with stripes, often seen in coral reefs. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 My colors can be bright.
🐠 I am a type of fish.
🦓 I have stripes

ocean.question: I am a very large mammal that lives in the ocean and sings songs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am the biggest animal on Earth.
🎵 I make beautiful sounds in the ocean.
🌊 I swim in saltwater.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. I can also squirt ink! What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I have many arms, but no legs.
🎨 I can change my color to hide.
⚫ When scared, I shoot out a dark liquid.

ocean.question: I am a type of hard, stony material formed in the ocean by tiny animals. What am I?

hints.text: 🏘️ Fish like to live in and around me.
🧱 I am made of small skeletons.
🏝️ I can form big reefs.

ocean.question: I am a strong, underwater current that moves warm water from the Gulf of Mexico. What am I?

hints.text: ↔️ I move water a long distance.
☀️ I am like a river, but in the ocean and warmer.
🇲🇽 I start near Mexico.

ocean.question: I am a group of islands formed from a volcano under the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🌋 I came from fire under the water.
🏝️ I am made of many small islands close together.
🌎 I am surrounded by water.

ocean.question: I am the zone in the ocean where sunlight can reach, allowing plants to grow. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ Plants can grow here.
🔦 Light penetrates me.
🌱 Life flourishes near the surface.

ocean.question: I am the measure of how much salt is in the ocean water. What am I?

hints.text: 🧂 Too much of me can hurt plants.
🌊 I am about the saltiness of the ocean.
🧪 Scientists can measure me.
